Suggestions for Improvement:

Cleaniness: Increase standards of cleanliness and invest in more cleaning materials and staff. 
Amenities: Upgrade existing amenities, introduce newer and better technologies, and provide better customer service.
Location: Consider introducing more convenient, accessible, and enjoyable experiences in the area.
Services: Ensure that services are delivered in a timely and dependable manner.
General: Enhance customer service, introduce new products and services, and make improvements to the overall customer experience.
Value: Consider lowering prices, creating more competitive pricing schemes, and introducing loyalty or reward programs.
